## 1.3.7 — Stability & Polish Update

<en-US>
This update focuses on improving app reliability and user experience with behind-the-scenes enhancements:

• Enhanced chat stability with better error handling and recovery
• Improved app performance during sign-in and profile creation
• More reliable data synchronization after login

Thank you for using BossUp! We're constantly working to make your experience better.
</en-US>
